00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"

00042 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00043 /** @defgroup PRINTF_Private_Macro printf private macros
00044   * @{
00045   */
00046 #define vaStart(list, param) list = (char*)((int)&param + sizeof(param))
00047 #define vaArg(list, type) ((type *)(list += sizeof(type)))[-1]
00048 /**
00049   * @}
00050   */
00051 
00052 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 static const char *FormatItem(const char *f, int a);
00054 static void PutRepChar(const char c, int count);
00055 static int PutString(const char *pString);
00056 static int PutStringReverse(const char *pString, int index);
00057 static void PutNumber(int value, int radix, int width, char fill);

00060 /** @defgroup PRINTF_Exported_Functions printf exported functions
00061   * @{
00062   */
00063 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00064  * @brief Print function.
00065  * @param f: Format string.
00066  * @retval String length.
00067  ************************************************************************************************************/
00068 signed int printf(const char *f, ...)
00069 {
00070   char *argP;
00071   int i = 0;
00072 
00073   vaStart(argP, f);
00074   while (*f)
00075   {
00076     if (*f == '%')
00077     {
00078       f = FormatItem(f + 1, vaArg(argP, int));
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082       fputc(*f++, (FILE *)1);
00083     }
00084     i++;
00085   }
00086   return i;
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00090  * @brief Put string.
00091  * @param pString: String.
00092  * @retval String length.
00093  ************************************************************************************************************/
00094 signed int puts(const char *pString)
00095 {
00096   int i;
00097   i = PutString(pString);
00098   fputc('\n', (FILE *)1);
00099   return i;
00100 }
00101 /**
00102   * @}
00103   */
00104 
00105 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00106 /** @defgroup PRINTF_Private_Function printf private functions
00107   * @{
00108   */
00109 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00110  * @brief Format item for print function.
00111  * @param f: Format string.
00112  * @param a: Length of format string.
00113  * @retval Point of string.
00114  ************************************************************************************************************/
00115 static const char *FormatItem(const char *f, int a)
00116 {
00117   char c;
00118   int fieldwidth = 0;
00119   int leftjust = FALSE;
00120   int radix = 0;
00121   char fill = ' ';
00122   int i;
00123 
00124   if (*f == '0')
00125   {
00126     fill = '0';
00127   }
00128 
00129   while ((c = *f++) != 0)
00130   {
00131     if (c >= '0' && c <= '9')
00132     {
00133       fieldwidth = (fieldwidth * 10) + (c - '0');
00134     }
00135     else
00136     {
00137       switch (c)
00138       {
00139         case '\000':
00140         {
00141           return (--f);
00142         }
00143         case '%':
00144         {
00145           fputc('%', (FILE *)1);
00146           return (f);
00147         }
00148         case '-':
00149         {
00150           leftjust = TRUE;
00151           break;
00152         }
00153         case 'c':
00154         {
00155           if (leftjust)
00156           {
00157             fputc(a & 0x7f, (FILE *)f);
00158           }
00159           if (fieldwidth > 0)
00160           {
00161             PutRepChar(fill, fieldwidth - 1);
00162           }
00163           if (!leftjust)
00164           {
00165             fputc(a & 0x7f, (FILE *)f);
00166             return (f);
00167           }
00168         }
00169         case 's':
00170         {
00171           i = 0;
00172           while (*((char *)(a + i)) !='\0' )
00173           {
00174             i++;
00175           }
00176 
00177           if (leftjust)
00178           {
00179             PutString((char *)a);
00180           }
00181 
00182           if (fieldwidth > i )
00183           {
00184             PutRepChar(fill, fieldwidth - i);
00185           }
00186 
00187           if (!leftjust)
00188           {
00189             PutString((char *)a);
00190           }
00191           return (f);
00192         }
00193          case 'l':
00194         {
00195           radix = -10;
00196           f++;
00197           break;
00198         }
00199         case 'd':
00200         case 'i':
00201         {
00202           radix = -10;
00203           break;
00204         }
00205         case 'u':
00206         {
00207           radix = 10;
00208           break;
00209         }
00210         case 'x':
00211         case 'X':
00212         {
00213           radix = 16;
00214           break;
00215         }
00216         case 'o':
00217         {
00218           radix = 8;
00219           break;
00220         }
00221         default:
00222         {
00223           radix = 3;
00224           break;
00225         }
00226       }
00227     }
00228     if (radix)
00229     {
00230       break;
00231     }
00232   }
00233 
00234   if (leftjust)
00235   {
00236     fieldwidth = -fieldwidth;
00237   }
00238 
00239   PutNumber(a, radix, fieldwidth, fill);
00240 
00241   return (f);
00242 }
00243 
00244 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00245  * @brief Put repeat character.
00246  * @param c: Character.
00247  * @param count: Repeat count
00248  ************************************************************************************************************/
00249 static void PutRepChar(const char c, int count)
00250 {
00251   while (count--)
00252   {
00253     fputc(c, (FILE *)1);
00254   }
00255 }
00256 
00257 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00258  * @brief Put string.
00259  * @param pString: String.
00260  * @retval String length.
00261  ************************************************************************************************************/
00262 static int PutString(const char *pString)
00263 {
00264     int i = 0;
00265     while (*pString != '\0')
00266     {
00267         fputc(*pString, (FILE *)1);
00268         pString++;
00269         i++;
00270     }
00271 
00272     return i;
00273 }
00274 
00275 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00276  * @brief Put string in reversed order.
00277  * @param pString: String.
00278  * @param index: String length
00279  * @retval String length.
00280  ************************************************************************************************************/
00281 static int PutStringReverse(const char *pString, int index)
00282 {
00283     int i = 0;
00284     while ((index--) > 0)
00285     {
00286         fputc(pString[index], (FILE *)1);
00287         i++;
00288     }
00289     return i;
00290 }
00291 
00292 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00293  * @brief Put number.
00294  * @param value: Value of number.
00295  * @param radix: Radix of number.
00296  * @param width: Width of number.
00297  * @param fill: fill character.
00298  ************************************************************************************************************/
00299 static void PutNumber(int value, int radix, int width, char fill)
00300 {
00301   char buffer[8];
00302   int bi = 0;
00303   unsigned int uvalue;
00304   unsigned short digit;
00305   unsigned short left = FALSE;
00306   unsigned short negative = FALSE;
00307 
00308   if (fill == 0)
00309   {
00310     fill = ' ';
00311   }
00312 
00313   if (width < 0)
00314   {
00315    width = -width;
00316    left = TRUE;
00317   }
00318 
00319   if (width < 0 || width > 80)
00320   {
00321     width = 0;
00322   }
00323 
00324   if (radix < 0)
00325   {
00326     radix = -radix;
00327     if (value < 0)
00328     {
00329       negative = TRUE;
00330       value = -value;
00331     }
00332   }
00333 
00334   uvalue = value;
00335 
00336   do
00337   {
00338     if (radix != 16)
00339     {
00340       digit = uvalue % radix;
00341       uvalue = uvalue / radix;
00342     }
00343     else
00344     {
00345       digit = uvalue & 0xf;
00346       uvalue = uvalue >> 4;
00347     }
00348     buffer[bi] = digit + ((digit <= 9) ? '0' : ('A' - 10));
00349     bi++;
00350   }
00351   while (uvalue != 0);
00352 
00353   if (negative)
00354   {
00355     buffer[bi] = '-';
00356     bi += 1;
00357   }
00358 
00359   if (width <= bi)
00360   {
00361     PutStringReverse(buffer, bi);
00362   }
00363   else
00364   {
00365     width -= bi;
00366     if (!left)
00367     {
00368       PutRepChar(fill, width);
00369     }
00370 
00371     PutStringReverse(buffer, bi);
00372 
00373     if (left)
00374     {
00375       PutRepChar(fill, width);
00376     }
00377   }
00378 }
00379 /**
00380   * @}
00381   */
00382
